title: Baked cheesecake with blackberries, blueberries and  figs
description: Previously I have always done no-bake cheesecakes. Partly due to laziness and partly because I was unsure of the taste. But I finally succumbed and this is a stunning cheesecake with so much rich, creamy flavour. I believe I am now a baked cheesecake expert!Equipment and preparation: you will need a 23cm/9in springform cake tin.
ingredients: 2 figs, each cut into 6 evenly-sized wedges
